author: nhcwebmaster@noaa.gov (NHC Webmaster)
nhc_headline: ...FLOSSIE CONTINUES TO STRENGTHEN OFFSHORE THE COAST OF SOUTHWEST MEXICO...
summary: ...FLOSSIE CONTINUES TO STRENGTHEN OFFSHORE THE COAST OF SOUTHWEST MEXICO... As of 3:00 AM CST Tue Jul 01 the center of Flossie was located near 16.9, -105.1 with movement WNW at 10 mph. The minimum central pressure was 981 mb with maximum sustained winds of about 85 mph.

summary_detail.value: ...FLOSSIE CONTINUES TO STRENGTHEN OFFSHORE THE COAST OF SOUTHWEST MEXICO... As of 3:00 AM CST Tue Jul 01 the center of Flossie was located near 16.9, -105.1 with movement WNW at 10 mph. The minimum central pressure was 981 mb with maximum sustained winds of about 85 mph.

title: Summary - Hurricane Flossie (EP1/EP062025)
